MED North End Boarding
Metra Electric inbound and outbound trains will board from the north end of the platform at 47th, 27th, McCormick Place, and 18th Street.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=1&Twitter=1
Metra Alert ME - Homewood East Side Construction Will Begin March 13

Beginning Monday, March 13, access to the Homewood Station from the east will be closed for station construction until Summer 2024.  Access to the boarding platform will be through the Park Avenue entrance ONLY (west side of tracks).

 

Beginning, Monday, March 6, the Pace bus stop will relocate from Harwood Avenue to Park Avenue.  Please allow additional time and use caution near the work zone.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=1&Twitter=1
Metra Alert RI - Construction begins April 21 at 103rd Street Washington Heights Station.
Metra forces will begin work Friday, April 21 on a major rehab project at the 103rd Street/Washington Heights Station on the Rock Island Line, for more informaiton click here.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=0&Twitter=0
Metra Alert UP-W - Changes to Union Pacific West and Northwest lines effective May, 30

Metra is making adjustments to its schedules on the Union Pacific Northwest and Union Pacific West lines beginning Tuesday, May 30. The changes are being made to better match actual operating conditions and create service patterns that provide riders with more options. For more information, Union Pacific Northwest and Union Pacific West riders are advised to review the new schedules at metra.com/alternate-schedules.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=0&Twitter=0

Metra Alert - Memorial Day Weekend Schedules/Restrictions

Metra will operate a normal weekday schedule on Friday, May 26.  Also, Metra will operate a Sunday/Holiday Schedule on Monday, May 29 (Memorial Day).

Alcohol will not be allowed on any Metra train on Saturday, May 27 through and including Monday, May 29.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=1&Twitter=0
Metra Alert RI - Track construction Saturday, May 27 through Sunday, May 28

Track construction will begin Saturday, May 27 through midday Sunday, May 28. Trains may incur delays enroute up to 20 minutes behind schedule passing through the work zone. Please listen to announcements for any platform changes. For additional information visit metra.com/constructionnotices.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=1&Twitter=0
Metra Alert UP-N - Track construction Saturday, May 27 through Sunday, May 28

Track construction will begin Saturday, May 27 through midday Sunday, May 28. Trains may incur delays enroute up to 15 minutes behind schedule passing through the work zone. Please listen to announcements for any platform changes. For additional information visit metra.com/constructionnotices.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=1&Twitter=0

Metra Alert RI - No Rock Island Service in Joliet on Saturday, June 3

Metra's Rock Island Line trains will operate to and from the New Lenox Station instead of Joliet on Saturday, June 3, due to a Canadian National track project planned for that date. CN will be replacing the tracks at its intersection with Metra tracks between Joliet and New Lenox on Saturday, June 3. This work will temporarily block Metra’s access to its Joliet Station. All Rock Island service on that date will originate from and terminate at New Lenox.

Regular service to Joliet is planned to resume on Sunday, June 4. Metra riders are advised to monitor Metra’s website, metra.com, for any service alerts related to this project.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=1&Twitter=0
Metra Alert UP-NW - Clybourn Station Platform Rehabilitation

The north half of paltform #2 at the Clybourn station is closed for rehabilitation. Once completed, the work will begin on the south half of platform #2 and into platform #1. The project is scheduled to be completed by the end of July.

Please allow addtional time to access the in-service platform and exercise caution near the work zones.
